
== ZOO-Project 1.3.0 release notes ==

* Updating ZOO.Class object with the OpenLayers.Class Updating ZOO.Class with the (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/64)
* Correct the content of proj4js (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/63)
* Enhance the COOKIE gesture (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/68)
* Support for dataInputs URLEncoded and xlink:href (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/62)
* Use the same object structure for JavaScript arguments than for Python
* Add the Normalized Difference Vegetation Index service
* Add importScripts function to JavaScript support (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/66)
* Add multiple inputs values for the same identifier (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/72)
* Add Python ZOO-API to access ZOO-Kernel internel functions
* Add a [headers] section in main.cfg file to add specifics to header returned
* Add support for multiple outputs for both GET and POST requests
* Add Content-Length to the headers if the result is sized
* Add Content-Disposition to the headers if the result contains a filename
* Add support for sending headers through JS ZOO-api
* Add support for multi-valued inputs in JS ZOO-api
* Fixing issue about invalid status document https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/73
* Add Python-3.3.0 support
* Update documentation
* Add MapServer W*S Support documentation https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/34
* Fix POST Request issue (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/34)
* Fix COOKIE gesture (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/79)
* Remove verbose messages when using MapServer W*S (ticket https://svn.zoo-project.org/trac/ticket/80)
* Add COMMITTERS  and LICENSE files

([http://lists.osgeo.org/pipermail/zoo-discuss/2013-July/000992.html Reference])
